.. _changelog:

Changelog
=========

3.6.2 (not yet released)
------------------------

* New: Better test coverage with tox.
* New: Added Travis CI.
* New: Improved tests.

3.6.1 (September 9th, 2015)
---------------------------

* Compatibility with Django 1.8 and Grappelli 2.7

For further information, see :ref:`releasenotes`.
